verses.verse: Now as Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on his way, <S%H1870><s%> the angels <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H6293><s%> him.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> when <S%H9201><s%> he saw <S%H7200><s%> them, "This <S%H2088><s%> is God's camp. <S%H4264><s%>" So he named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanaim. <S%H4266><s%>

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him to his brother <S%H251><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Seir, <S%H8165><s%> the country <S%H7704><s%> of Edom. <S%H9000><s%>

He also commanded <S%H6680><s%> them saying, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "I have sojourned <S%H1481><s%> with Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and stayed <S%H309><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now; <S%H6258><s%>

and I have <S%H1961><s%> oxen <S%H7794><s%> and donkeys <S%H2543><s%> [and] flocks <S%H6629><s%> and male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%>; <S%H8198><s%> and I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> that I may find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%>"' "

And the messengers <S%H4397><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We came <S%H935><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Esau, <S%H6215><s%> and furthermore <S%H1571><s%> he is coming <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> you, and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> are with him."

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> and distressed; <S%H9503><s%> and he divided <S%H2673><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him, and the flocks <S%H6629><s%> and the herds <S%H1241><s%> and the camels, <S%H1581><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> companies; <S%H4264><s%>

for he said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to the one <S%H259><s%> company <S%H4264><s%> and attacks <S%H5221><s%> it, then the company <S%H4264><s%> which is left <S%H7604><s%> will escape. <S%H6413><s%>"

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "O God <S%H430><s%> of my father Abraham <S%H1><s%> and God <S%H85><s%> of my father Isaac, <S%H430><s%> O Lord, <S%H1><s%> who didst say <S%H3327><s%> to me, 'Return <S%H3068><s%> to your country <S%H559><s%> and to your relatives, <S%H7725><s%> and I will prosper <S%H776><s%> you,'

I am unworthy <S%H6994><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> the faithfulness <S%H571><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thou hast shown <S%H6213><s%> to Thy servant; <S%H5650><s%> for with my staff <S%H4731><s%> [only] I crossed <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> I have become <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> companies. <S%H4264><s%>

"Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, I pray, <S%H4994><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my brother, <S%H251><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Esau; <S%H6215><s%> for I fear <S%H3372><s%> him, lest <S%H6435><s%> he come <S%H935><s%> and attack <S%H5221><s%> me, the mothers <S%H517><s%> with the children. <S%H1121><s%>

"For Thou didst say, <S%H559><s%> 'I will surely <S%H3190><s%> prosper <S%H3190><s%> you, and make <S%H7760><s%> your descendants <S%H2233><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>'"

So he spent <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%> Then he selected <S%H3947><s%> from what he had <S%H935><s%> with him a present <S%H4503><s%> for his brother <S%H251><s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%>

two hundred <S%H3967><s%> female <S%H5795><s%> goats <S%H5795><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> male <S%H8495><s%> goats, <S%H8495><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> ewes <S%H7353><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>

thirty <S%H7970><s%> milking <S%H3243><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> and their colts, <S%H1121><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> cows <S%H6510><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> female <S%H860><s%> donkeys <S%H860><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> male <S%H5895><s%> donkeys. <S%H5895><s%>

And he delivered <S%H5414><s%> [them] into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> every <S%H5739><s%> drove <S%H5739><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> "Pass <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H6440><s%> me, and put <S%H7760><s%> a space <S%H7305><s%> between <S%H996><s%> droves. <S%H5739><s%>"

And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> the one <S%H7223><s%> in front, <S%H7223><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When <S%H3588><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> meets <S%H6298><s%> you and asks <S%H7592><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'To whom <S%H4310><s%> do you belong, and where <S%H575><s%> are you going, <S%H1980><s%> and to whom <S%H4310><s%> do these <S%H428><s%> [animals] in front <S%H6440><s%> of you belong?'

then you shall say, <S%H559><s%> '[These] belong to your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> it is a present <S%H4503><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%> And behold, <S%H2009><s%> he also <S%H1571><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> us.' "

Then he commanded <S%H6680><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> and the third, <S%H7992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> those who followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> the droves, <S%H5739><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "After this <S%H2088><s%> manner <S%H1697><s%> you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> when you find <S%H4672><s%> him;

and you shall say, <S%H559><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> is behind <S%H310><s%> us.' "For he said, <S%H559><s%> "I will appease <S%H3722><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with the present <S%H4503><s%> that goes <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me. Then afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> his face; <S%H6440><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> he will accept <S%H5375><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me. "
So the present <S%H4503><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> on before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, while he himself <S%H1931><s%> spent <S%H3885><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

Now he arose <S%H6965><s%> that same <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> maids <S%H8198><s%> and his eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> children, <S%H3206><s%> and crossed <S%H5674><s%> the ford <S%H4569><s%> of the Jabbok. <S%H2999><s%>
And he took <S%H3947><s%> them and sent <S%H5674><s%> them across <S%H5674><s%> the stream. <S%H5158><s%> And he sent <S%H5674><s%> across <S%H5674><s%> whatever <S%H834><s%> he had.
Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> and a man <S%H376><s%> wrestled <S%H79><s%> with him until <S%H5704><s%> daybreak. <S%H7837><s%>

And when he saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had not prevailed <S%H3201><s%> against him, he touched <S%H5060><s%> the socket <S%H3709><s%> of his thigh; <S%H3409><s%> so the socket <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's thigh <S%H3409><s%> was dislocated <S%H3363><s%> while he wrestled <S%H79><s%> with him.

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> me go, <S%H7971><s%> for the dawn <S%H7837><s%> is breaking. <S%H5927><s%>" But he said, <S%H559><s%> "I will not let <S%H7971><s%> you go <S%H7971><s%> unless <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> you bless <S%H1288><s%> me."
So he said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> is your name <S%H8034><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Your name <S%H8034><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> but Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for you have striven <S%H8280><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> and with men <S%H376><s%> and have prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>"

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me your name. <S%H8034><s%>" But he said, <S%H559><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> is it that you ask <S%H7592><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%>?" And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> him there. <S%H8033><s%>

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> Peniel, <S%H6439><s%> for [he said,] "I have seen <S%H7200><s%> God <S%H430><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> yet my life <S%H5315><s%> has been preserved. <S%H5337><s%>"

Now the sun <S%H8121><s%> rose <S%H2224><s%> upon him just <S%H9201><s%> as he crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Penuel, <S%H6439><s%> and he was limping <S%H6760><s%> on his thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

Therefore, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> do not eat <S%H398><s%> the sinew <S%H1517><s%> of the hip <S%H5384><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the socket <S%H3709><s%> of the thigh, <S%H3409><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he touched <S%H5060><s%> the socket <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob's thigh <S%H3409><s%> in the sinew <S%H1517><s%> of the hip. <S%H5384><s%>
